title: Mark Aguiar | Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis
snippet: Mark Aguiar is a consultant at ... University. Previously, he was a professor of economics at the University of Rochester and a senior economist at the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston....

title: Mark Aguiar - Wikipedia
snippet: Aguiar was an assistant professor of economics at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business between 1999 and 2004, a senior economist at the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston from 2004 to 2006, and a tenured associate professor of economics at the University of Rochester from 2006 to 2011.

title: Mark A. Aguiar
snippet: Mark A. Aguiar is the Walker Professor of Economics and International Finance at Princeton University. His research focuses on models of consumption and savings with applications in both open- and closed-economy macroeconomics.

title: Mark A. Aguiar - Princeton University
